Company Former Name: BorgWarner's North American Controls Business, BWNAC, BorgWarner (North American Controls Business), BorgWarner North American Controls
Description: Manufacturer of solenoid and control products intended for the automotive original equipment manufacturers, aftermarket and other industrial sectors. The company specializes in transmission solenoids, engine solenoids, stop-start accumulators and hydraulic control modules, thereby enabling industries with design, prototyping, development and manufacturing combined with a strong intellectual property portfolio across product categories.
Financing Status Note: The company, a subsidiary of BorgWarner, was acquired by Atar Capital, through a $72 million LBO on December 31, 2021.
